tweet:
"We are reminded, however, that "for everything there is a season," and I believe that the time has come for a change. Therefore, this is my last term in the U.S. House of Representatives." (2/2)

For full statement click below: https://bit.ly/2naradd

"It has been a great honor to serve the people of the 13th District of Texas as their congressman for the last 25 years. They have given me opportunities to serve the nation in ways I could have never imagined, including as Chairman of the House Armed Services Committee. (1/2)
Happy 72nd birthday to the United States Air Force.  Thank you for your continued service to our country. #HBUSAF https://twitter.com/usairforce/status/1174314731768811521 …
"We should also commit to reminding each other and educating those too young to remember that terrible day that we must always stand guard to protect our freedom and our way of life." (2 of 2)

"September 11 is one of those days, like December 7, that we should always commemorate.  We should remember the victims and honor those who have fought to stop other terrorist attacks, especially those who sacrificed their own lives to do so." (1 of 2)

"Mexico has become our largest trading partner, and no state benefits more from that trade than Texas.  Speaker Pelosi should allow a vote on the new USMCA now.  Every day without it costs jobs, customers, and a stronger economy." - Rep. Thornberry pic.twitter.com/Imu3fTZmnI
